briefTitle: Intensive Glycemic Control and Skeletal Health Study
officialTitle: Intensive Glycemic Control and Skeletal Health Study - Ancillary Study to the Action to Control Cardiovascular Risk in Diabetes Trial (ACCORD-BONE)

interventions.name: hypoglycemic agents, hydroxymethylglutaryl-CoA Reductase inhibitors, hypertensive agents

summary: The purpose of the ACCORD-BONE Study is to investigate the effects of intensive glycemic control for type 2 diabetes (in ACCORD participants) on factors related to bone health, including, fractures, falls, and bone mineral density.

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Participants With at Least One Non-vertebral Fracture
